name: Other party has made an application for a conditional order SOLICITOR
body:
Case number: ((reference number))
Applicant: ((applicant name)) 
Respondent: ((respondentname))
Your reference: ((solicitor reference)) 

Dear ((solicitor name))

The other party has applied for a conditional order as a sole applicant. 

You can see the application for conditional order by signing into your MyHMCTS account: ((signin url)) 

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: Other party has made a sole application for a conditional order: ((reference number))
